text:
Negative: Range is around 85 km, Issues are charging time 0 to 100 around 6.5 hours, charging point is not easy to acess, seat folding is not a good one, understorage is not good

Positive: I have vida v1 since 10 months done 6500 kms, no issues such , ride quality is excellent abs brakes in front are damn good,.
Dc  Fast charging at 0 t 100% in 60 minutes, It is best among competition

text:
Tell the truth bro 

Im also V1+ owner 
Paani jata Bootspace me 
Regenbraking kam nahi karta 
Range 145 IDC real life 110 bola tha 85 km lagbhag milta wobhi eco mode pe 
Rear wheel mudguard nahi hai 
Rainy season me Pani and mitti jaata battery ke case and andar body pe jo Khrab karega gaadi longevity

I've also 
TVS iQube 
Ola s1 pro 3rd gen 
Ather rizta

author: @surajbarnwal

text: ‚Äã¬†@surajbarnwal¬†bro I am also using it daily vidav1 plus, im not facing issues, my group are all having ather 450x, rishta, and chetak and ola, so all batteries run at 19 km per kilowatt, it's common
author: @kirannr4987

text: One more thing, I have driven all electric 2wheelers, I don't need to explain vida is good or not, it has its drawbacks but no electric vehicle can go more than 20 km per kilowatt, my brother owns ather, we have driven more than 35k, ather service is costly, it's good but it's pricey, on touch of breaks little bit also, pickup drops on ola, chetak and ather, but vida pickup is instant along with braking,  suspension is fantastic compared to chetak and ather, all electric 2 wheelers are one way or other are not good

author: @omkarshaw622

text:
absolutely true!!!
i donno what is wrong with the hero company, its been almost 2.5 years since the launch of this terrible vehicle, there are a lot of problems which they just dont seem to care about.
i am facing the safe mode issue where
the vehicle just stops abruptly in the middle of the road as a cherry on top the, the rear wheel gets locked restricting the rider to even push the vehicle to the road side which is some serious danger to the rider. this is just one of the many problems i am facing.
author: @balachandra1501

text:
problems in the vehicle 
1. Safe mode isssue 
its not frequent but when it happens its reallly dangerous as explained above. 
2. Rear brakes 
they almost dont seem to stop the vehicle especially when riding with pillion  2/10 braking 
3. Seat comfort 2/10
4. Suspention 3/10
5. Charging port 
the charging port in the vehicle is placed in the most unreachable and congested place under the boot 
Pros of the vehicle 
1. Good power in all modes especially in eco mode 
2. The riding and handling of the vehicle is really good
3. Supports ather grid charger
author: @balachandra1501

text:
I have vida v1 since 10 months done 6500 kms, no issues such , ride quality is excellent abs brakes in front are damn good,.
 Issues are charging time 0 to 100 around 6.5 hours, charging point is not easy to acess, seat folding is not a good one, understorage is not good
